compatibility.notes: CC-BY-3.0-AT is a permissive license that allows for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Must provide appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made.
Cannot impose additional restrictions on the rights granted by the license.
license.name: CC-BY-3.0-AT
obligations: Attribution must be given to the original creator.
License must be included with any distribution of the work.
Copyright notice must be included with any distribution of the work.
Notice of any changes made to the original work must be provided.
